reviewText: Added to Grandkids collection--they love these stories!
Grandson can't get enough of this series

the dvd had the following episodes..
monster blood- was pretty good
more moster blood- was ok
how to kill a monster- was so so
the girl who cried monster- was really good
night of the living dummy 2- was awesome
bride of the living dummy- was awesome
say cheese and die- was amazing
say cheese and die .. again- was pretty good
the price individually for these dvds are too high but this 3 pack is a real deal. highly recommended to fans of are you afraid of the dark or for someone who wants a scare!
No DVD menu, no subtitles, no spanish or french dubbed version.  No Dolby Surround or Stereo sound.
Great fun. Evocative of childhood ghost stories. Good for Halloween or any time. Not too scary and no gore or swearing.
arrived quick brand new in package great price would definatly order again
My 6 year old daughter LOVES Goosebumps and this one is no exception!!! I was amazed at how much she enjoyed Slappy, the Dummy:-)
Kids love it , just scary enough.
It was a gift sent somewhere else. I assume everything was fine.
